title: Xbox's Fight Against Paid Next-Gen Upgrades - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.08.20
description:
Greg and Gary Whitta talk about Xbox telling publishers they can't charge for next-gen upgrades, Core paying you to create games, and more! 

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
Every day this week a new part of Andy’s Full Playthrough of The Last of Us Part 2 will post at 3PM PT on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
We’re reacting to Ubisoft Forward on Sunday at noon pt.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:10 - Xbox Won’t Allow Publishers to Charge for Next-Gen Upgrades, James Batchelor @ GIB
00:25:25 - COD:MW Removes the OK Symbol Out, Wesley Yin Poole @ Eurogamer
00:31:20 - Make Money in Core
00:37:38 - Xcloud is Helping Devs WFH, Allan Poore, Partner Group Program Manager, Project xCloud
00:42:10 - Top PSN Downloads for June
00:41:40 -  Quip
00:43:39 - Klarna 
00:46:20 -  Hims
00:48:30 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:50:00 - When reviewing any game, how much do you talk with other critics about the game? - Gondors Condor
01:04:20 - Squad Up: http://kindafunny.com/steven
01:11:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Blessing
